title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1930.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1930.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of the Special Needs Housing Program is to
assist eligible not-for-profit corporations in the acquisition, rehabilitation, reconstruction or improvement of single room occupancy accommodations for
persons of lower income. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1930.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
